title: 12 - Why we get blessings from saints on birthday?
author: Rajaramjoshi
date: "07/01/2020"
categories: [Conversations, Sannidhi street]

He came all the way to get blessings on his birthday. Bhagavan told that we get blessings from saints or God on birthday, to contemplate on the purpose of this birth and purpose of life.
 
Please follow the [link](https://youtu.be/rReurdFE7zY?si=EsgeKKsT-6d_IA1D) for the satsang in youtube.
